author: zongaro
msg: Patch for XALANJ-2175 reviewed by Sarah McNamara (mcnamara () ca ! ibm ! com).
Updated JDK version test so that -Xbootclasspath option will be specified for
spawned JVM if the version is not one of 1.1, 1.2 or 1.3.  That allows the
test harness to work on JDK 1.1 through 1.5, and I hope it will allow us to
avoid the need to add checks for more JDK versions in the future.

author: mcnamara
msg: Adding Tidy.jar and its associated files to the xml-xalan/test/tools directory
and removing it from xml-xalan/java/bin as this tools is required for testing
purposes and not for building the Xalan source.
This change was reviewed and approved in XALANJ-2170 by Christine Li.
